# The calendar extension

Configure the `calendar` extension.

This extension provides support for calendar conversion.

## PHP_EXT_CALENDAR

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_CALENDAR_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
